base_description: Rectangular blue sunglasses with white arms.
part_description: Two blue rectangular lenses, brown top frame, white arms, and black nose pads, symmetrically arranged.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are held together by the brown top frame, which provides structural support. The white arms are hinged to the frame, allowing them to fold inward. The black nose pads are attached to the lenses, providing comfort and stability when worn.
external_interaction_description: These sunglasses are designed to be worn on the face, with the arms resting on the ears and the nose pads sitting on the nose. They provide eye protection from sunlight and can be used as a fashion accessory, interacting with various light conditions and enhancing visual comfort.
